statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM financial_data WHERE account_number = 12345;
SELECT transaction_type FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_id > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_number, amount FROM financial_data WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT account_number, SUM(amount) FROM financial_data GROUP BY account_number HAVING SUM(amount) > 5000
SELECT MIN(amount), MAX(amount) FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_type = 'Credit'
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT account_number, transaction_type, SUM(amount) FROM financial_data GROUP BY account_number, transaction_type HAVING SUM(amount) > 200
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT company_name, revenue, expenses FROM financial_data;
SELECT id, company_name, revenue, expenses FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT * FROM budget_forecasts WHERE year = 2022 AND quarter = 3;
SELECT id, year, quarter, budgeted_revenue, budgeted_expenses FROM budget_forecasts ORDER BY year DESC, quarter ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > 10000 ORDER BY expenses DESC
SELECT id, company_name, revenue, expenses FROM financial_data WHERE company_name LIKE 'Company%'
SELECT company_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(expenses) AS total_expenses FROM financial_data GROUP BY company_name
SELECT id, quarter, year, budgeted_revenue, budgeted_expenses FROM budget_forecasts WHERE quarter = 2 AND year = 2021
SELECT company_name, budgeted_revenue, budgeted_expenses FROM financial_data JOIN budget_forecasts ON financial_data.id = budget_forecasts.id
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT department, revenue, expenses FROM financial_data WHERE profit > 5000;
SELECT id, department, profit FROM financial_data ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT department, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM financial_data GROUP BY department;
SELECT forecast_data.month, forecast_data.revenue_forecast, budget_data.budget_amount FROM forecast_data INNER JOIN budget_data ON forecast_data.month = budget_data.id;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY profit DESC
SELECT department, revenue, expenses FROM financial_data WHERE department LIKE 'Sales%'
SELECT department, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM financial_data GROUP BY department HAVING total_revenue > 100000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT department, budget_amount, actual_amount, variance FROM budget_data WHERE variance BETWEEN -500 AND 500 ORDER BY variance
SELECT month, revenue_forecast, expenses_forecast, profit_forecast FROM forecast_data WHERE month = '2022-03-01'
SELECT id, year, month, revenue, expenses FROM FinancialData WHERE year = 2021
SELECT department, budget_amount, actual_amount FROM BudgetData WHERE department = 'Marketing'
SELECT year, month, forecasted_revenue, forecasted_expenses FROM ForecastData ORDER BY year DESC, month ASC
SELECT * FROM Department WHERE manager = 'John Doe'
SELECT id, name, manager, location FROM Department WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT year, month, revenue, expenses FROM FinancialData WHERE year = 2021 AND month = 6;
SELECT department, year, budget_amount, actual_amount FROM BudgetData WHERE department = 'Sales' AND year = 2022;
SELECT name, manager, location FROM Department WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT department, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget, AVG(actual_amount) AS avg_actual FROM BudgetData GROUP BY department;
SELECT year, month, forecasted_revenue, forecasted_expenses FROM ForecastData WHERE year = 2023 AND forecasted_revenue > 50000;
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT description, amount FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_type FROM accounts;
SELECT account_id, SUM(opening_balance) AS total_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT account_id, account_name, opening_balance FROM accounts WHERE opening_balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, SUM(opening_balance) AS total_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY account_id, account_name;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_type, a.account_name, t.transaction_amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id WHERE t.transaction_amount < 0;
